insert into sell_r (sell_rno, memberno, nickname, rafflename, raffleprice, raffleamount, text, deadline) values (SEQ_SELL_RNO.nextval, #{memberno}, #{nickname}, #{rafflename}, #{raffleprice}, #{raffleamount}, #{text}, #{deadline})
